targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostmeta}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  |> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.host == "${hostmeta}" and     r._measurement == "system" and    r._field == "n_cpus")  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.host == "${hostmeta}" and     r._measurement == "mem" and    r._field == "total")  
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)  
|> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.nodeID == "${metaID}" and     r._measurement == "meta" and    r._field == "isResponding")  
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)  
|> yield(name: "last")  
|> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_threads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${hostmeta}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${hostmeta}")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "time", "host"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostmeta}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with n_cpus: float(v: r.n_cpus)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with load1_percore: r.load1 / r.n_cpus}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "load1", "n_cpus", "host", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load5" or r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostmeta}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with n_cpus: float(v: r.n_cpus)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with load5_percore: r.load5 / r.n_cpus}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "load5", "n_cpus", "host", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load15" or r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostmeta}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with n_cpus: float(v: r.n_cpus)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with load15_percore: r.load15 / r.n_cpus}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "load15", "n_cpus", "host", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "available_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${hostmeta}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column =~ /^_(start|stop)/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with usedmemory: 100.0 - r.available_percent}))
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column =~ /available_percent/)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.nodeID == "${metaID}" and 
    r._measurement == "highResMeta" and
    r._field == "netRecvBytes")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.nodeID == "${metaID}" and 
    r._measurement == "highResMeta" and
    r._field == "netSendBytes")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.nodeID == "${metaID}" and 
    r._measurement == "highResMeta" and
    r._field == "workRequests")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.nodeID == "${metaID}" and 
    r._measurement == "highResMeta" and
    r._field == "queuedRequests")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.nodeID == "${metaID}" and 
    r._measurement == "meta" and
    r._field == "directWorkListSize")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.nodeID == "${metaID}" and 
    r._measurement == "meta" and
    r._field == "indirectWorkListSize")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "load5" or r["_field"] == "load15")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${hostmeta}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_user" or r["_field"] == "usage_system" or r["_field"] == "usage_iowait")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${hostmeta}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")  
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "running" or r["_field"] == "blocked" or r["_field"] == "sleeping" or r["_field"] == "stopped" or r["_field"] == "zombies")  
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${hostmeta}")  
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)  
|> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] =~ /cpu[0-9].*/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${hostmeta}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column =~ /^_(start|stop)/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with usage_idle: 100.0 - r.usage_idle}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${hostmeta}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "available" or r._field == "buffered" or r._field == "free" or r._field == "cached" or r._field == "used" or r._field == "total" or r._field == "mapped" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition: from(bucket: "${bucket}")  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  |> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.nodeID == "${metaID}" and     r._measurement == "meta" and    r._field == "hostnameid") |> last()
list.name: hostmeta
list.query: from(bucket: "${bucket}")  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)  |> filter(fn: (r) =>    r.nodeID == "${metaID}" and     r._measurement == "meta" and    r._field == "hostnameid") |> last()
